page.title: 08CONSTANTINE FURTHEREDUCATION
page.content: SECONDARY SCHOOLING; From the age of eleven ,the village children travel by busto either PENRYN COMPREHENSIVE SCHOOLwhich caters for children up to 16 years,then to FALMOUTH SCHOOL 6th Form or a minority go to HELSTON COMPREHENSIVE which takes pupils up to 18 years.Some of the pupils go to CAMBORNE COLLEGE OF TECHNOLOGY at 16years.Fee paying pupils might go to TRURO SCHOOL or TREMOUGH CONVENT FOR GIRLS.Transport would be free for pupils going to PENRYN COMPREHENSIVE. ADULT EDUCATION classes take place atPenryn and Helston Comprehensive Schools in the evenings in a variety of subjects.There are also classes held in the Primary schools of the area if there is enough demand from the village population during the winter months.Keep fit,gardening,needleworkare popular.
